item.title: Dire Destiny
item.description: Dire Destiny Created: 2022-05-05 15:44 Priest Boss notes covert player cards - when drawing keep cards more over next turn priest had a chase to take one of one of your minions drawn from your deck more minions more chances if your draw x amount of minions take steal card from discard pile highest cost add mana double the cards cost powerful spells from god worship

item.title: Genesis Rising
item.description: Genesis Rising Created: 2022-06-01 23:18 Plays on a 2D plane. Ships have slots for ‘genes’ which give special actions. Mix and match to customize ships.
